def_en: A fig is a soft sweet fruit that grows in hot countries. It is full of tiny seeds and is often eaten dried.
A fig or a fig tree is a tree on which figs grow.

def_cn: (对…)丝毫(不)在乎，完全(不)放在心上
def_en: If you say that someone doesn't care a fig or doesn't give a fig about something, you are emphasizing that they think it is unimportant or that they are not interested in it.
